title: This Website Does Not Exist - AI Web Developer
description:
CodeGen are pre-trained, open source, code generation models of various sizes (up to 16.1B parameters). I found that the fastest & smallest multi-language model would get confused between programming languages, so wanted to fine-tune it
                    to focus on a specific language. Combining fine-tuned HTML and CSS models allows us to generate "full websites".
image_alt: a screenshot of css code generated by an LLM

title: Latent Space Museum
description: A place to explore text-to-image art generations. Synthesised Images arranged by CLIP or Colour into a 2D world. HTML5 game served with FastAPI in a docker container.
image_alt: A screenshot from the game play of the latent space museum

title: Pysimulacra - python wrapper for SAC AI art Dataset
description: Built to help make Image Generation data more accessible. SQL -> pandas wrapper.

title: ConvRGB - Colour Feature extraction tool
description: Python package with a convolutional model & palette algorithm to extract RGB features from given image/s.
image_alt: a generation of all rgb colors, computer graphics, image

title: WakeTimes - Simple Timezone Matching
description: Built to help people across different timezones organise their communication schedule.

title: Explore Melbourne's Foot Traffic
description: An R Shiny Web app built to help people understand how the time of the day, the day of the week, and the Covid-19 Lockdown influence the number of pedestrians throughout the City of Melbourne, Australia.

title: Companion Planting Dataset
description: A data set containing info about the relationships between plants to help with companion planting. Scraped from Wikipedia, cleaned to only include relationships with references.

title: Nail Biting - Detection & Alert
description: Take a photo with the webcam every 2 seconds, send a notification if nail biting is detected in the image. Powered by a CNN. The preprocessed dataset is available on huggingface.
image_alt: The weights and biases learning curve, nail biting dataset samples

title: Bias in Image generation models
description: Comparing gender bias in recent text to image models. Creating a dataset across Midjourney, Stable diffusion, Dalle2, Craiyon & Google images
image_alt: a graph comparing the presence of gender in image gen models

title: Collaborative Playlist
description: A twitter post called for music recommendations, they were good tunes so I scraped the thread for links, this playlist is the result

title: Homemade Electric Drumkit
description: Experimenting with an electric drum using a raspberry pi and accelerometers.
image_alt: a close up of some wires in a breadboard for a raspberry pi

title: NZ Prisons Analysis & Directory
description: A data driven, dynamic directory of New Zealand's prisons, and a visualization and analysis of Dept Corrections and Justice data.

title: Support Black Owned Restaurants in LA
description: An interactive map to help people on instagram find and support black owned restaurants in Los Angeles.
